document.full_text: the first new roller coasters to be built at coney island in eight decades were opened on wednesday as part of efforts to reverse the decline of new york city's world-famous theme park.
document.title: coney island gets first new roller coasters in 80 years
lines_and_colors: the first new roller coasters to be built at coney island in eight decades were opened on wednesday as part of efforts to reverse the decline of new york city's world-famous theme park.
